choking_adult.situation: Person cannot breathe, speak, or cough
steps: Ask: 'Are you choking?' If they can speak or cough, encourage them to continue coughing
If unable to speak, stand behind them and wrap arms around their waist
Make a fist with one hand and place thumb side against middle of abdomen, above navel
Grasp fist with other hand and give quick upward thrusts
Continue until object is expelled or person becomes unconscious
If unconscious, begin CPR and call emergency services
do_not: Do not perform abdominal thrusts on pregnant women or obese individuals - use chest thrusts instead
Do not slap on the back if person is coughing effectively
Do not put fingers in mouth to remove object unless visible and easily reachable
